# unleash_user (Data Source)

Fetch a user by id or email.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "unleash_user" "admin" {
  id = "1"
}

data "unleash_user" "search_by_email" {
  email = "byemail@example.com"
}
```

```terraform
data "unleash_user" "searchable" {
  email = "user@example.com"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) Identifier for this user.
- `email` (String) The email of the user.
- `id` (String) Identifier for this user.
- `name` (String) The name of the user.
- `username` (String) The username of the user.

### Read-Only

- `root_role` (Number) The role id for the user.
